name: Magic Encyclopedia: First Story
summary: Catherine had just finished taking her exams at the Academy for Magic when she received an urgent message born on the wings of a paper bird. Curious, she opened the note and was instantly transported to a strange jungle, where she began her whirlwind adventure to stop the awakening of a terrible dragon. As Catherine's guiding hand, you'll travel around the world, collecting various objects and then using them to solve cunning puzzles. Featuring hand-painted scenery, addictive mini-games and a spellbinding story, Magic Encyclopedia offers a seek-and-find adventure you'll never forget!
